bioghist.p: The Utica Daily Union is a newspaper from Utica, N.Y., it started publishing daily (except Sundays) in 1895, and covers the area of Utica and Oneida.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: "Utica Daily Union" on Microfilm #5834 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
